weakness.name: Non-auditable resource changes
weakness.desc: The Diagnostic Logs are not activated and configured. Therefore, the changes or the access to the resources are not recorded into the logs.

test.steps:
1. Go to the Azure portal.
  2. Go to the blade for your web app and in "Monitoring" >> "Diagnostics logs".
  3. Check that "Application Logging (Filesystem)" and "Application Logging (Blob)" are enabled.
  4. Check that the type "Storage" or "File System" are enabled.
